channel.title: Rune Essence Mining
channel.description:
Whenever I mine rune essence on my server, the rune essence rock acts like a normal rock... having to respawn... I only know how to make the mining continuous if I change every single rock so that is also a problem. To summarize, I need help making the rune essence rock not have to respawn as well as make the player keep mining until his/her inventory is full.
Mediafire has an auto virus scan, just in case someone thinks that I put a virus in a text file.
actionhandler.java [url=http://www.mediafire...7iu95ukhmj8qexn]http://www.mediafire...7iu95ukhmj8qexn[/url]
mining.java [url=http://www.mediafire...7iu95ukhmj8qexn]http://www.mediafire...7iu95ukhmj8qexn[/url]
